metadata.synopsis: goblin carrying explosives into the attack on the grove

1.speaker: 769c8964-7b9f-4040-a742-9ebcecc07ce1
1.text: Plenty of tieflin' meat for the lads back at camp...
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: he's carrying an explosive barrelNodeContext: with a cruel smile - talking about the corpses of the people they've just killed

2.speaker: 769c8964-7b9f-4040-a742-9ebcecc07ce1
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: he's carrying an explosive barrelNodeContext: with a cruel smile

0.speaker: 769c8964-7b9f-4040-a742-9ebcecc07ce1
0.text: ... when I hit 'em with this stuff, it'll barely leave a stain.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: he's carrying an explosive barrelNodeContext: referring to the explosives he's carrying
